                    About Media.net                

Website 


        Media.net is a leading global ad tech company comprising of 1,300+ talented employees exclusively focused on developing innovative monetization products for digital publishers. By revenue, Media.net runs the #2 largest contextual ads program globally. We work as a trusted advisor to top management across various large publishers. We provide our publisher clients with expert advice, comprehensive access to the best monetization opportunities, and outstanding execution via highly customized solutions across all advertising formats- search, native, display, content, video, mobile, product, local and social ads. We consistently deliver long-term superior performance by using leading-edge technology, algorithms, high-quality research, and proprietary processes that allow us to display the most precisely targeted, highest paying ads.

We have a global footprint of offices spread across New York, Los Angeles, Dubai, Mumbai, Bangalore, Zurich, Frankfurt, etc.

About the job

    Media.net is a leading global advertising technology company that develops innovative products for publishers and ad companies worldwide by market cap and runs the second-largest contextual advertising business worldwide by revenue. While our HQ is in Dubai, our employees are spread across key operation centers in New York, Los Angeles, Dubai, Zurich, Mumbai, and Bangalore. Media.net is both large and small! It's got the culture of a startup with the stability and resources of a larger organization. We have a flat hierarchy, great perks and benefits, and an amazingly progressive culture

Key responsibilities:

1. Enhancing customers' portfolio performance by ensuring continuous improvement on a daily basis
2. Investigating websites and conducting research & analysis for identifying concepts of domain names
3. Optimizing domain names and consistently monitoring domain names as per customer feedback and satisfaction for internet advertising
4. Checking the content, quality, and accuracy of each concept
5. Checking keyword lists of advertisers to maximize ROI for each advertiser/publisher
6. Creating daily, weekly, and monthly performance reports for performance analysis
7. Monitoring and enforcement of acceptable usage policies in cases of system abuse, illegal usage, misrepresentation, etc.
8. Working on constant learning of concepts pertaining to internet advertising
9. Liaising with the business development specialists to facilitate the maximization of revenue ensuring the smooth functioning of the department

Skills & Requirements:

1. 2023 graduates only
2. Experience in online media is a bonus
3. Excellent oral & written communication skills
4. Excellent analytical skills
5. Good team player
6. Ability to complete large volumes of work quickly and independently
7. High level of drive, initiative, and self-motivation
8. Avid internet user, with a strong inclination toward technology
9. Familiarity with the Internet search industry preferred

                    About Black Rhino                

Website 


        BlackRhino is being built with a vision to help businesses reduce their environmental impact and achieve their sustainability goals, while building a sustainable and profitable business of their own.
Our current focus is on building Industry specific solutions to help businesses measure and report their greenhouse gas emissions, as well as offer carbon offsetting services to help companies mitigate their impact on the environment.
With a technology first approach, we are developing tools and technologies to help companies assess their existing emissions footprint, create targets and roadmaps aligned with Industry benchmarks. Our platform will allow customers to invest in carbon offsets to mitigate emissions impact.

About the job

    Passionate and self-start individual who wants to make a difference by contributing in the area of sustainability. Excited to work in an early-stage startup (which comes with its own perks).

Responsibilities of a Sustainability Analyst may include:

1. Best-in-class sustainability frameworks: Contribute in development of frameworks that can be leveraged for conducting the assessments and streamlining the analysis lifecycle.
2. Conducting sustainability assessments: This involves evaluating the environmental, social, and economic performance of a company or organization and identifying areas for improvement. Sustainability Analysts use various tools and methodologies to assess sustainability performance, such as LCA, carbon footprint analysis, and social impact assessments.
3. Developing sustainability strategies and action plans: Based on the assessment, the Sustainability Analyst will develop recommendations and action plans to help the company or organization improve its sustainability performance. 
4. Collecting and analysing sustainability data: The Sustainability Analyst is responsible for collecting, analysing, and interpreting data related to the company or organization's sustainability performance. This includes data related to energy and water consumption, greenhouse gas emissions, waste generation, and social impact.
5. Reporting and communicating sustainability performance: The Sustainability Analyst is responsible for communicating the company or organization's sustainability performance to stakeholders, including employees, investors, customers, and the public. This may involve developing sustainability reports, presentations, and other communication materials.
6. Conducting research and staying up-to-date on sustainability trends: Stay up-to-date on the latest sustainability trends and best practices

Good to have:

1. Understanding of global/Local standards like TCFD, SASB, BRSR
2. Strong analytical skills and experience conducting sustainability assessments.
3.  Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
4. Familiarity with sustainability tools and methodologies, such as life cycle assessment, carbon footprint analysis, and social impact assessment.

Business Analysis
Business Research
Marketing

About the job

    We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented professional to join our team as an Automation and Dashboard Specialist. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing automated processes and creating visually appealing dashboards, as well as demonstrating proficiency in related software and Excel. You will work closely with stakeholders to understand their requirements and design solutions that streamline workflows, enhance data visualization, and improve overall efficiency.

Key responsibilities:

1.     Design, develop, and implement automated processes to improve the efficiency and accuracy of data analysis and reporting.
2.     Create visually appealing and interactive dashboards that effectively communicate complex data insights to stakeholders.
3.     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and understand business needs for automation and dashboard creation.
4.     Utilize your expertise in related software tools to enhance data manipulation, analysis, and visualization.
5.     Develop and maintain documentation for automated processes, dashboards, and related workflows.
6.     Understanding Software Requirement Specifications and identifying the required test scenarios.

9.     Creating clear and informative visual representations of data using charts, graphs, and dashboards.
10.     Create dashboards and automated reports to monitor key performance indicators
11.     Manage end-to-end dashboard development, from data collection to visualization
12.     Ensure dashboard functionality and user experience meet stakeholder needs
13.     Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices related to operations dashboard and visualization
14.     Ability to analyze, assess, and execute in a fast-paced environment
15.     Provide outstanding communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills to articulate complex information in a clear and concise manner.

Qualifications:

1.     Bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, or related field
2.     1+ years of experience in dashboard development, data analysis, or related field
3.     Expertise with BI tools such as Tableau and Einstein Analytics

About the job

    Key responsibilities:

1.    Establish proper classification and apply labels to the images and video data with established procedures
2.    Tag the data based on certain rules to provide useful information for the machine learning team
3.    Make content distinctions, identify patterns, and build a high-quality dataset to allow easier and faster user accessibility
4.    Provide constructive feedback to engineers on tooling and processes for more efficient labeling and improved data quality
5.    Identify and analyze any bugs and errors found and document them for review
6.    Evaluate metrics to help improve our productivity
7.    Work closely with AI engineers & SMEs to support the model development process
8.    Use a data labeling tool to label/annotate data, tag, and catalog
9.    Work with a team of computer vision engineers and data scientists for building and delivering high-quality data sets for computer vision models and training
10.    Work extensively on data annotation/tagging and labelling, enabling clean and structured data input as well as output
11.    Learn tasks from written instructions or minimal discussion
12.    Oversee and manage the annotation team, ensuring efficient and accurate annotation processes
13.    Conduct regular team meetings to discuss project updates, address challenges, and foster knowledge sharing among team members
14.    Review and provide feedback on annotations completed by the team, offering constructive suggestions for improvement and ensuring consistent quality
15.    Act as a point of contact for any annotation-related queries or issues from both internal team members and different team members
16.    Monitor project progress and deadlines, ensuring timely completion of annotation tasks and effective resource allocation within the team
17.    Handle any escalations or conflicts within the annotation team, resolving issues promptly

Skills Required:

1. Previous experience with data labeling or image annotation
2. Basic knowledge of Python programming
3. Good communication skills and the ability to work in a team environment
4. Leadership skills to manage the team

About the job

    Become our GA expert and own the GA space. A Google Analytics Subject Matter Expert (SME) is a specialist who has an extensive understanding of the Google Analytics platform. They provide deep insights into how users interact with a particular website, leveraging Google Analytics to optimize business processes. 

Key responsibilities:

1. Analytics Implementation and Management: They set up Google Analytics to monitor traffic and user behavior on websites. They also ensure that tracking codes are properly installed on all pages of a site and test them to ensure they are working correctly.
2. Data Analysis and Reporting: They analyze the data collected from Google Analytics and generate reports to provide insights into user behavior, acquisition channels, audience segments, and other aspects of site performance.
3. Strategic Insights: They use data to provide strategic insights to the business, such as identifying areas for improvement, spotting trends, suggesting optimizations, and more.
4. Training and Guidance: As an SME, they are often responsible for training other members of the team on how to use Google Analytics and interpret its data. They may also create documentation to guide the use of the tool within the organization.
5. Integration with other Tools: They work on integrating Google Analytics with other digital marketing and data tools, such as Google AdWords, SEO tools, CRM systems, and more, to provide a holistic view of digital performance.
6. Keeping Up with Updates: Google frequently updates its tools, so an SME needs to stay up-to-date with these changes and implement them accordingly.
7. Data Accuracy and Privacy Compliance: They ensure that the data collected complies with data privacy laws and standards such as GDPR, CCPA, etc. They also work to maintain data accuracy and integrity.
8. Goal and Conversion Tracking: They are responsible for setting up and managing goals in Google Analytics to track key conversions and business KPIs. They may also work on attribution modeling to understand the path users take to conversion.

We will provide the necessary training and support. This is a full-time job. Depending upon candidate's ability to learn, there may be a 90-day probation. Salary will be paid during probation.

                    About Unihire                

        Unihire is a platform that connects companies with universities and colleges to hire students for full-time roles/internships

We help companies, college management, and students streamline the whole end-to-end hiring process on a single online platform. Some of the core benefits of the platform are; that students get access to better opportunities based on their individual capabilities. They don't have to depend on the limited outreach of their college to get a good start in their career.

Secondly, universities can focus on what they do best - provide world-class education. Companies directly reach out to the relevant campuses and we manage the whole application process end-to-end. No need for email attachments and excel sheets. Also, companies save a lot of time by directly broadcasting a job to the relevant colleges rather than repeating the same process for each new college. Getting applications back take days rather than weeks because of our deep integration.

About the job

    Key responsibilities:

1. Server-side Development: Building efficient and scalable server-side applications using Node.js, which is known for its event-driven and non-blocking I/O model. This involves handling HTTP requests, implementing business logic, and integrating with databases and other services.
2. API Development: Designing and developing RESTful APIs or GraphQL endpoints to expose functionality and data to client applications. This includes defining routes, handling request/response objects, and ensuring proper authentication and authorization mechanisms are in place.
3. Database Integration: Integrating Node.js applications with databases like MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL. This involves designing database schemas, writing queries, and implementing data access layers (ORM or raw queries) to perform CRUD operations and manage data efficiently.
4. Front-end Collaboration: Collaborating with front-end developers to ensure smooth integration between the server-side and client-side components. This may involve providing necessary APIs, discussing data formats, and working together to deliver end-to-end features and functionality.
5. Testing and Debugging: Writing unit tests and integration tests to ensure the reliability and correctness of the codebase. Debugging and fixing issues in production or development environments, using debugging tools and techniques to diagnose and resolve problems.
6. Performance Optimization: Identifying and addressing performance bottlenecks in Node.js applications. This includes optimizing database queries, implementing caching mechanisms, using appropriate data structures, and adopting best practices to enhance the overall performance and scalability of the application.
7. Security and Authentication: Implementing security measures to protect the application and its data. This involves handling user authentication and authorization, validating input data, preventing common security vulnerabilities (such as SQL injection and cross-site scripting), and ensuring secure communication with external services.
8. Deployment and DevOps: Participating in deployment and DevOps processes to ensure smooth deployment and operation of the application. This may involve setting up build pipelines, configuring continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) systems, and monitoring application performance and availability.

Express.js

Node.js

About the job

    Key responsibilities: 

1. WordPress Development: The primary responsibility of a WordPress developer is to proficiently develop and maintain WordPress-based websites and applications. This includes creating custom themes, plugins, and functionalities using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The developer should have a deep understanding of WordPress architecture, template hierarchy, and database structure to ensure efficient and secure coding practices.
2. Website Customization and Optimization: A WordPress developer is responsible for customizing and optimizing websites to meet client requirements. This involves implementing design layouts, configuring plugins, and integrating third-party tools or APIs. The developer should have expertise in responsive design, cross-browser compatibility, and website performance optimization techniques to ensure an excellent user experience.
3. Troubleshooting and Technical Support: As a WordPress developer, it is crucial to diagnose and resolve technical issues that may arise during website development or after deployment. This includes troubleshooting compatibility conflicts, resolving coding errors, and addressing security vulnerabilities. Additionally, providing technical support to clients or end-users, assisting with content updates, and ensuring regular backups and updates are also important responsibilities of a WordPress developer.

About the job

    A MERN stack developer is a software developer who specializes in building web applications using the MERN stack. The MERN stack is a popular web development technology stack that includes MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

Key responsibilities:

1. Develop and maintain web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack.
2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
3. Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
4. Troubleshoot and debug issues in existing applications and provide solutions.
5.  Participate in code reviews to ensure the quality of codebase.
6. Work with designers and front-end developers to implement and integrate user interfaces.
7.  Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
8.  Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in web development.
9. Continuously improve development processes and methodologies.
10. Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders to deliver high-quality software products on time.

Requirements:

1. React.js (min 1-2 years)
2. Strong proficiency in JavaScript and its modern frameworks/libraries (React.js, Node.js).
3. Experience with MongoDB or other NoSQL databases.
4. Knowledge of Express.js or other Node.js frameworks.
5.  Familiarity with front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
6. Understanding of RESTful API design and development.
7. Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
8. Solid understanding of web development principles and best practices.
9.  Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
10.  Strong communication and collaboration skills.
11.  Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
12.  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent experience).

Note that this job description may vary depending on the specific requirements and preferences of the hiring company.

                    About Stirring Minds                

        Stirring Minds is a premier startup ecosystem in India, dedicated to helping businesses launch, scale, and succeed. As a leading incubator, we provide funding, co-working spaces, and mentorship to support the growth of innovative companies. In addition to our incubator services, we also host the largest startup event in the country known as Startup Summit Live, bringing together entrepreneurs and industry leaders to connect, learn, and collaborate. 

Our community-driven approach extends beyond our event and incubator offerings, as we work to create communities of like-minded individuals who can support and learn from one another. We have been recognized by top media outlets both in India and internationally, including the BBC, The Guardian, Entrepreneur, and Business Insider. Our goal is to provide a comprehensive ecosystem for startups and help turn their ideas into reality.

About the job

    Apply only if you have at least 80% knowledge of the following tech with minimum 1+ year work experience.

Key responsibilities:

1. Work on leading and developing our product from scratch.
2. Work on both frontend and backend development, utilizing technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, ReactJS, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB

Additional skills in AngularJS and Socket.IO are a plus. To be successful in this role, you should have worked on at least one live project and have a strong understanding of the MERN stack. Experience with AWS DevOps, agile development practices, and code reviews is preferred. Startup experience will also be beneficial.

As part of our agile and collaborative tech team, you will be responsible for building highly scalable and robust backend architecture for our cloud services. You will work closely with designers and front-end engineers to develop APIs for our services. Testing, debugging, and maintaining the application software throughout the product lifecycle, including unit testing, will be an essential part of your role. You will report directly to the CTO, and there is potential for growth within the company, including the opportunity to become the CTO yourself.

Our selection process includes profile screening, a technical task, a technical call with the CTO, a business call with the CEO to discuss terms, and finally, selection and onboarding. Please only apply if you are willing to follow this process.

In return, you will have the opportunity to work with a fast-growing startup that has a mature product line and a global audience. There is potential for relocation abroad and competitive incentives. We offer a fun and casual work environment with flexible hours. As you progress, there is the possibility of an onsite position abroad and promotion to the role of CTO.

Thank you for considering this opportunity!

About the job

    At Bulkpe, we are revolutionizing business banking and payments for MSMEs. Our mission is to provide accessible and innovative financial solutions that empower businesses to thrive. We are building a robust infrastructure that will handle secure transactions and streamline banking operations. With a vision to become the leading neobank in the industry, we are seeking individuals who are passionate about solving complex problems and driving meaningful impact.

We are looking for someone who has:

- Strong expertise in backend development and API design.
- Proficiency in Data Structures, Algorithms, and Object-Oriented Programming.
- Experience with database design, optimization, and cloud-based architectures.

Day-to-day responsibilities:
- Brainstorm and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms, and products.
- Work individually and closely with other team members during code sprints to deliver end-to-end solutions.
- Integrate with bank and third-party APIs.
- Build and maintain multiple modules like metering and pricing.

We are not looking for people who:

- Prefer a structured environment over a dynamic startup setting
- Who doesn't have an interest in working and building startups
- Who has not built any tech products previously

What we offer:

- Competitive compensation package and ownership through equity
- Fast-paced, continuous learning and collaborative environment
- Flexible leave policy

What are our core values:

1. Ownership & Accountability - We take ownership of our work, act with conviction, and hold ourselves accountable for results.
2. Continuous Learning - We value knowledge sharing, documentation, and constant growth to stay ahead in a rapidly evolving industry.
3. Curiosity & Critical Thinking - We encourage asking insightful questions and going deep to understand the root of problems.
4. Hard Work & Persistence - We believe that true success comes from relentless effort and overcoming challenges.
5. Agility & Momentum - We embrace a fast-paced environment, keeping momentum and adapting to changing circumstances.
6. Profitability & Sustainability - We strive for long-term profitability, understanding that sustainable growth drives meaningful impact.
7. Patience & Resilience - We acknowledge that great achievements take time and require perseverance in the face of setbacks.

About the job

    We are seeking a skilled and motivated Full Stack Developer with expertise in MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack to join our dynamic and innovative team.

Key responsibilities:

1. Front-end Development: Develop interactive and user-friendly web applications using modern front-end technologies, such as React.js (MERN stack). Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate wireframes and mock-ups into responsive and visually appealing user interfaces.
2. Back-end Development: Create robust and scalable server-side applications using Node.js and Express.js (MERN stack). Design and develop APIs to facilitate seamless communication between the front-end and back-end components.
3. Database Management: Design and implement database schemas using MongoDB (MERN stack). Optimize database performance and ensure data integrity and security.
4. Integration and Deployment: Work on integrating various third-party services, APIs, and components into the application. Deploy and maintain the application on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
5. Testing and Bug Fixing: Conduct thorough testing of the developed applications to identify and fix bugs and ensure high-quality code.
6. Collaboration and Teamwork: Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other developers, to ensure a smooth development process.
7. Code Optimization and Performance: Continuously review and optimize code for maximum performance and efficiency. Identify and implement best practices and coding standards.

Preferred candidate profile

1.     Bachelor's degree in CS, Software Engineering, or a related field. 
2.     Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in MERN stack technologies.
3.     Strong proficiency in front-end development technologies like React.js (MERN).
4.     In-depth knowledge of server-side technologies like Node.js and Express.js.
5.     Familiarity with database systems, particularly MongoDB, and ability to design efficient database schemas.
6.     Experience working with RESTful APIs and integrating third-party services and APIs into applications.
7.     Knowledge of cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for deployment and scalability.
8.     A portfolio of past projects or code samples showcasing your skills and capabilities would be highly beneficial.

6. Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
7. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

About the job

    Before applying for the Job please read the description carefully

We are seeking a talented and experienced Full Stack Developer with a strong background in 3D rendering to join our development team. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying interactive web applications that incorporate 3D visualizations and graphics. Yo

Responsibilities:

1. Develop interactive web applications that integrate 3D rendering and graphics using industry-standard technologies and frameworks.
2. Collaborate with designers and product managers to understand project requirements and translate them into functional, visually appealing, and user-friendly interfaces.
3. Implement front-end designs using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, or Vue.js) to create responsive and interactive UIs.
4. Utilize 3D rendering libraries and frameworks (e.g., WebGL, Three.js, or Babylon.js) to create and optimize 3D models, textures, animations, and lighting effects.
5. Write custom shaders (GLSL or HLSL) to achieve advanced visual effects and optimize rendering performance.
6. Develop and maintain backend APIs and server-side logic using server-side programming languages (e.g., Python, Java, or Node.js).
7. Handle data storage, retrieval, and processing requirements for 3D rendering applications, integrating with databases and other backend systems.
8. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, artists, and other developers, to ensure seamless integration of 3D elements into the overall application architecture.
9. Perform code reviews, identify and fix bugs, and optimize application performance.
10. Stay up to date with emerging trends and technologies in 3D rendering, graphics, and full stack development, and share knowledge within the team.

Qualifications:

1. Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
2. Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with a focus on 3D rendering and graphics.
3. Strong proficiency in front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, or Vue.js).
4. Solid understanding of 3D rendering principles and experience with libraries/frameworks such as WebGL, Three.js, or Babylon.js.
5. Proficiency in server-side programming languages such as Python, Java, or Node.js, and experience with backend development and API integration.

About the job

    Apply only if you have at least 80% knowledge of the following tech with minimum 1+ year work experience.

Key responsibilities:

1. Work on leading and developing our product from scratch.
2. Work on both frontend and backend development, utilizing technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, ReactJS, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB

Additional skills in AngularJS and Socket.IO are a plus. To be successful in this role, you should have worked on at least one live project and have a strong understanding of the MERN stack. Experience with AWS DevOps, agile development practices, and code reviews is preferred. Startup experience will also be beneficial.

As part of our agile and collaborative tech team, you will be responsible for building highly scalable and robust backend architecture for our cloud services. You will work closely with designers and front-end engineers to develop APIs for our services. Testing, debugging, and maintaining the application software throughout the product lifecycle, including unit testing, will be an essential part of your role. You will report directly to the CTO, and there is potential for growth within the company, including the opportunity to become the CTO yourself.

Our selection process includes profile screening, a technical task, a technical call with the CTO, a business call with the CEO to discuss terms, and finally, selection and onboarding. Please only apply if you are willing to follow this process.

In return, you will have the opportunity to work with a fast-growing startup that has a mature product line and a global audience. There is potential for relocation abroad and competitive incentives. We offer a fun and casual work environment with flexible hours. As you progress, there is the possibility of an onsite position abroad and promotion to the role of CTO.

Thank you for considering this opportunity!

                    About Agrosperity Tech Solutions Private Limited (KiVi)                

Website 


        KiVi (operating through Agrosperity Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd) is an agri-tech start-up that aims to make farming a livelihood of choice for millions of Indians. Our core offering is a unique phygital platform, named KiVi which stands for Kisan Vikas (farmer development) and a franchisee network that delivers the last mile transaction capability. Our goal is a 10x growth in the farmer's income. 

KiVi provides digital financial solutions and a phygital platform for the farmer to procure input, implement agronomy practices, and process & market output. It employs a micro-entrepreneur-led (franchisee) model that combines the strength of the platform with the franchisee's local expertise, social capital, and last-mile transaction capability.

About the job

    At Bulkpe, we are revolutionizing business banking and payments for MSMEs. Our mission is to provide accessible and innovative financial solutions that empower businesses to thrive. We are building a robust infrastructure that will handle secure transactions and streamline banking operations. With a vision to become the leading neobank in the industry, we are seeking individuals who are passionate about solving complex problems and driving meaningful impact.

We are looking for someone who has:

- Strong expertise in backend development and API design.
- Proficiency in Data Structures, Algorithms, and Object-Oriented Programming.
- Experience with database design, optimization, and cloud-based architectures.

Day-to-day responsibilities:
- Brainstorm and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms, and products.
- Work individually and closely with other team members during code sprints to deliver end-to-end solutions.
- Integrate with bank and third-party APIs.
- Build and maintain multiple modules like metering and pricing.

We are not looking for people who:

- Prefer a structured environment over a dynamic startup setting
- Who doesn't have an interest in working and building startups
- Who has not built any tech products previously

What we offer:

- Competitive compensation package and ownership through equity
- Fast-paced, continuous learning and collaborative environment
- Flexible leave policy

What are our core values:

1. Ownership & Accountability - We take ownership of our work, act with conviction, and hold ourselves accountable for results.
2. Continuous Learning - We value knowledge sharing, documentation, and constant growth to stay ahead in a rapidly evolving industry.
3. Curiosity & Critical Thinking - We encourage asking insightful questions and going deep to understand the root of problems.
4. Hard Work & Persistence - We believe that true success comes from relentless effort and overcoming challenges.
5. Agility & Momentum - We embrace a fast-paced environment, keeping momentum and adapting to changing circumstances.
6. Profitability & Sustainability - We strive for long-term profitability, understanding that sustainable growth drives meaningful impact.
7. Patience & Resilience - We acknowledge that great achievements take time and require perseverance in the face of setbacks.

                    About Parsi Dairy Farm Private Limited                

Website 


        Parsi Dairy Farm  Private Limited a family business was established in the year 1916. It was started by a young Parsi entrepreneur late Nariman Ardeshir. Since the inception of Parsi Dairy Farm, his main motto was to serve the best quality fresh milk either off the shelf ("Galla") or home delivered across the city of Mumbai. In the year 1967, the family purchased farmland near Talasari, in the village of Varvada, along the Mumbai -Gujarat highway, where we serve delicious vegetarian food along with our regular mithais and other products. What started as a simple milk business, was prospering by staying true to its tagline, "Rich! Pure! Wholesome!". Parsi Dairy Farm was one of the first businesses in India to introduce yogurt. There was also further growth in the product portfolio of the Indian sweets (Mithai) business. Our Flagship Store is located at 261/63, Shamaldas Gandhi Marg, Princess Street, Marine Lines (East), Mumbai -400002.

About the job

    Key responsibilities:

1. - Collaborate with our computer vision research team to explore and develop novel algorithms and techniques for object detection, recognition, tracking, and other computer vision tasks.
2. - Assist in collecting and preparing datasets for training and evaluating computer vision models. This may involve data labeling, annotation, and data augmentation tasks.
3. - Train and fine-tune computer vision models using deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
4. - Evaluate the performance of computer vision models and propose improvements based on empirical results.- Contribute to the development of computer vision prototypes and demos that showcase the capabilities of our technology to potential clients and stakeholders.
5. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including software engineers and product managers, to integrate computer vision capabilities into dotEYE Labs' products and solutions.
6. - Stay up-to-date with the latest developments in computer vision research, attending conferences, reading academic papers, and implementing state-of-the-art techniques.
7. - Document research findings, experiments, and project outcomes to share knowledge and contribute to the development of internal resources.

Requirements:

1. - Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field with a focus on computer vision, image processing, or machine learning.
2. - Strong programming skills in Python or C++ for implementing computer vision algorithms.
3. - Familiarity with deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch for model training and evaluation.
4. - Basic understanding of computer vision concepts and algorithms, such as image processing, object detection, and feature extraction.
5. - Enthusiasm for exploring new technologies and finding creative solutions to challenging problems in the field of computer vision.
6. - Ability to think critically, analyze data, and propose solutions based on empirical evidence.
7. - Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a team environment, sharing ideas and collaborating on projects.
8. - Ability to manage time effectively, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines for project milestones.

About the job

    We are seeking a skilled and motivated Full Stack Developer with expertise in MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack to join our dynamic and innovative team.

Key responsibilities:

1. Front-end Development: Develop interactive and user-friendly web applications using modern front-end technologies, such as React.js (MERN stack). Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate wireframes and mock-ups into responsive and visually appealing user interfaces.
2. Back-end Development: Create robust and scalable server-side applications using Node.js and Express.js (MERN stack). Design and develop APIs to facilitate seamless communication between the front-end and back-end components.
3. Database Management: Design and implement database schemas using MongoDB (MERN stack). Optimize database performance and ensure data integrity and security.
4. Integration and Deployment: Work on integrating various third-party services, APIs, and components into the application. Deploy and maintain the application on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
5. Testing and Bug Fixing: Conduct thorough testing of the developed applications to identify and fix bugs and ensure high-quality code.
6. Collaboration and Teamwork: Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other developers, to ensure a smooth development process.
7. Code Optimization and Performance: Continuously review and optimize code for maximum performance and efficiency. Identify and implement best practices and coding standards.

Preferred candidate profile

1.     Bachelor's degree in CS, Software Engineering, or a related field. 
2.     Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in MERN stack technologies.
3.     Strong proficiency in front-end development technologies like React.js (MERN).
4.     In-depth knowledge of server-side technologies like Node.js and Express.js.
5.     Familiarity with database systems, particularly MongoDB, and ability to design efficient database schemas.
6.     Experience working with RESTful APIs and integrating third-party services and APIs into applications.
7.     Knowledge of cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for deployment and scalability.
8.     A portfolio of past projects or code samples showcasing your skills and capabilities would be highly beneficial.

                    About Leamigo Private Limited                

Website 


        We are a bunch of crazy travelers and believe traveling is not just visiting a place and taking selfies and social media updates. It's a connection and an experience of a place in terms of culture, arts, history, people, etc.

Pack your bags, charge yourselves and be ready to have a memorable experience with Leamigo.

About the job

    We are looking for a highly capable blockchain developer to design, implement, and distribute a secure blockchain-based solution to our clients. You will be analyzing the client's requirements and also should know how we can save time by using our existing client solutions.

Who can apply:

1. More than 1 year of hands-on experience in working with Blockchain technology.
2. Code reviews, ensuring that the code follows the best technical practices and design patterns
3. Must have knowledge of web3.js ether.js and graphql
4. Evangelize technical best practices, incorporate emerging solutions and employ scalable designs that can be easily adopted
5. Must have knowledge of EVM-based Public Blockchain like Ethereum, Tron, Solana
6. Extensive experience in back-end development, algorithms, and data structures.
7. Knowledge of protocols like ERC721, ERC1155, or ERC223.
8. Knowledge of Token concepts like Stable token, Security token, Utility token
9. Knowledge of Consensus Algorithms like Proof-of-Work, Proof-of-Stake, Delegated Proof-of-Stake, Leased Proof-Of-Stake, Proof of Elapsed Time, Proof-of-Activity, Proof-of-Importance, Proof-of-Capacity, Proof-of-Burn, Proof-of-Weight.
10. Knowledge of cryptography and blockchain protocols.
11. Good Knowledge of Cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure.
12. Good Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases.
13. In-depth knowledge of best practices in blockchain management and data protection.
14. Advanced analytical and problem-solving skills.
15. Superb organizational skills and keen attention to detail.
16. Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.

Key responsibilities:

1. Analyzing and understanding the business use cases in implementing Blockchain.
2. Collaborating with CTO to determine blockchain technology needs and envisaged functionalities.
3. Applying the latest cryptology techniques to protect digital transaction data against cyber-attacks and information hacks.
4. Creating application features and interfaces by using programming languages and writing multithreaded codes.
5. Maintaining client and server-side applications.
6. Communicating with clients and understanding their requirements.
7. Optimizing and securing blockchain applications by integrating new tools and technologies.
8. Educating team members on blockchain features.
9. Documenting blockchain development processes and complying with best practices in data protection.

Blockchain
Ethereum
JavaScript
ReactJS
Rust
Solidity
web3.js

About the job

    Before applying for the Job please read the description carefully

We are seeking a talented and experienced Full Stack Developer with a strong background in 3D rendering to join our development team. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying interactive web applications that incorporate 3D visualizations and graphics. Yo

Responsibilities:

1. Develop interactive web applications that integrate 3D rendering and graphics using industry-standard technologies and frameworks.
2. Collaborate with designers and product managers to understand project requirements and translate them into functional, visually appealing, and user-friendly interfaces.
3. Implement front-end designs using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, or Vue.js) to create responsive and interactive UIs.
4. Utilize 3D rendering libraries and frameworks (e.g., WebGL, Three.js, or Babylon.js) to create and optimize 3D models, textures, animations, and lighting effects.
5. Write custom shaders (GLSL or HLSL) to achieve advanced visual effects and optimize rendering performance.
6. Develop and maintain backend APIs and server-side logic using server-side programming languages (e.g., Python, Java, or Node.js).
7. Handle data storage, retrieval, and processing requirements for 3D rendering applications, integrating with databases and other backend systems.
8. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, artists, and other developers, to ensure seamless integration of 3D elements into the overall application architecture.
9. Perform code reviews, identify and fix bugs, and optimize application performance.
10. Stay up to date with emerging trends and technologies in 3D rendering, graphics, and full stack development, and share knowledge within the team.

Qualifications:

1. Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
2. Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with a focus on 3D rendering and graphics.
3. Strong proficiency in front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, or Vue.js).
4. Solid understanding of 3D rendering principles and experience with libraries/frameworks such as WebGL, Three.js, or Babylon.js.
5. Proficiency in server-side programming languages such as Python, Java, or Node.js, and experience with backend development and API integration.

                    About Unihire                

        Unihire is a platform that connects companies with universities and colleges to hire students for full-time roles/internships

We help companies, college management, and students streamline the whole end-to-end hiring process on a single online platform. Some of the core benefits of the platform are; that students get access to better opportunities based on their individual capabilities. They don't have to depend on the limited outreach of their college to get a good start in their career.

Secondly, universities can focus on what they do best - provide world-class education. Companies directly reach out to the relevant campuses and we manage the whole application process end-to-end. No need for email attachments and excel sheets. Also, companies save a lot of time by directly broadcasting a job to the relevant colleges rather than repeating the same process for each new college. Getting applications back take days rather than weeks because of our deep integration.

About the job

    A MERN stack developer is a software developer who specializes in building web applications using the MERN stack. The MERN stack is a popular web development technology stack that includes MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

Key responsibilities:

1. Develop and maintain web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack.
2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
3. Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
4. Troubleshoot and debug issues in existing applications and provide solutions.
5.  Participate in code reviews to ensure the quality of codebase.
6. Work with designers and front-end developers to implement and integrate user interfaces.
7.  Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
8.  Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in web development.
9. Continuously improve development processes and methodologies.
10. Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders to deliver high-quality software products on time.

Requirements:

1. React.js (min 1-2 years)
2. Strong proficiency in JavaScript and its modern frameworks/libraries (React.js, Node.js).
3. Experience with MongoDB or other NoSQL databases.
4. Knowledge of Express.js or other Node.js frameworks.
5.  Familiarity with front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
6. Understanding of RESTful API design and development.
7. Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
8. Solid understanding of web development principles and best practices.
9.  Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
10.  Strong communication and collaboration skills.
11.  Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
12.  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent experience).

Note that this job description may vary depending on the specific requirements and preferences of the hiring company.

About the job

    A subject matter expert (SME) is uniquely qualified to provide specialized knowledge to their team. Individuals designated as subject matter experts are typically sought out by others interested in leveraging their unique expertise to solve specific problems or help meet challenges. Being an expert is not a one-day job. Experts immerse in the topic and develop expertise over a long period.

The curriculum team at Allsoft Solutions is looking for a subject matter expert with a background in coding. This role involves assisting teachers and students with their queries, doubts and upskilling teachers on coding languages and various coding platforms/environments.

Key responsibilities:

1. Creating in house certification course(s) on different coding concepts
2. Creating and reviewing mock tests in line with the course created
3. Organizing and delivering training for teachers/ coordinating teams, also managing extra activities for Teacher Learning/Success/ Engagement to upscale them around technical aspects
4. Using the LMS environment to track the completion and adherence of all types of eLearning courses

Skill Sets:

Technical:

1. Understanding of Object-Oriented concepts
2. Basic understanding of core programming concepts with teaching skills will be an asset
3. Good exposure on Object-Oriented Programming language(s) (preferably JavaScript/Python)
4. Web Technology (HTML/CSS/JavaScript)- Front End Development
5. Block-Based Coding environment like Code.org or Scratch will be a plus
6. Knowledge of RDBMS (MySQL, Airtable, Firebase, etc.) will be an added advantage

Leadership Skills :

1. Asking the right questions to make things clear and simple
2. Good Problem-Solving Skills
3. Excelling in tasks assigned
4. Setting goals and working hard to achieve them
5. Improving abilities
6. Building relationships with coordinating team members
7. Having the right attitude
8. Good at responding to changes
9. Good Listening and Articulating skills
10. Should be open to suggestions and Feedback
11. Key Team player with critical thinking skills
12. Creative, Responsible, Honest, Motivated and Committed

About the job

    Are you an experienced Java developer looking for a new challenge? We're searching for an IT manager to join our Navi Mumbai-based team. If you have 3-5 years of industry experience with expertise in JavaScript, WordPress, HTML, CSS, PHP, and MySQL, you might be the perfect fit.

Key responsibilities:

1. Work on designing event websites, including integrating payment gateways like Razorpay and PayPal
2. Stay familiar with software like Flip PDF Professional for magazine creation and Photoshop for image production
3. Oversee website hosting and server management and carry out testing processes

Your problem-solving and debugging skills will be invaluable in this position. Your proficiency in using CMS platforms, notably WordPress will be a significant advantage. You'll need hands-on coding skills and a comprehensive understanding of operating systems, web browsers, and mobile apps.

You should possess an in-depth knowledge of web standards, accessibility, cross-browser compatibility, website security, and data privacy best practices. Strong communication skills are vital in this role, as you'll need to foster excellent working relationships with team members and leadership.

You will be in charge of planning and developing websites across multiple products and organizations, integrating data from various back-end services and databases, and maintaining, expanding, and scaling our site.

If you have experience in UI/UX design, that's a plus. You'll also manage our Google Workspace, offering IT support to employees. Your role will include working on newsletter software from our database, conducting mass mailings via Brevo and MailChimp, and releasing Spotify podcasts using an RSS Editor.

About the job

    Key responsibilities:

1. Server-side Development: Building efficient and scalable server-side applications using Node.js, which is known for its event-driven and non-blocking I/O model. This involves handling HTTP requests, implementing business logic, and integrating with databases and other services.
2. API Development: Designing and developing RESTful APIs or GraphQL endpoints to expose functionality and data to client applications. This includes defining routes, handling request/response objects, and ensuring proper authentication and authorization mechanisms are in place.
3. Database Integration: Integrating Node.js applications with databases like MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL. This involves designing database schemas, writing queries, and implementing data access layers (ORM or raw queries) to perform CRUD operations and manage data efficiently.
4. Front-end Collaboration: Collaborating with front-end developers to ensure smooth integration between the server-side and client-side components. This may involve providing necessary APIs, discussing data formats, and working together to deliver end-to-end features and functionality.
5. Testing and Debugging: Writing unit tests and integration tests to ensure the reliability and correctness of the codebase. Debugging and fixing issues in production or development environments, using debugging tools and techniques to diagnose and resolve problems.
6. Performance Optimization: Identifying and addressing performance bottlenecks in Node.js applications. This includes optimizing database queries, implementing caching mechanisms, using appropriate data structures, and adopting best practices to enhance the overall performance and scalability of the application.
7. Security and Authentication: Implementing security measures to protect the application and its data. This involves handling user authentication and authorization, validating input data, preventing common security vulnerabilities (such as SQL injection and cross-site scripting), and ensuring secure communication with external services.
8. Deployment and DevOps: Participating in deployment and DevOps processes to ensure smooth deployment and operation of the application. This may involve setting up build pipelines, configuring continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) systems, and monitoring application performance and availability.
Skill(s) required

Express.js
JavaScript
MongoDB
MySQL
Node.js
REST API

Key responsibilities:

Additional skills in AngularJS and Socket.IO are a plus. To be successful in this role, you should have worked on at least one live project and have a strong understanding of the MERN stack. Testing, debugging, and maintaining the application software throughout the product lifecycle, including unit testing, will be an essential part of your role. You will report directly to the CTO, and there is potential for growth within the company, including the opportunity to become the CTO yourself.

Our selection process includes profile screening, a technical task, a technical call with the CTO, a business call with the CEO to discuss terms, and finally, selection and onboarding. Please only apply if you are willing to follow this process.

In return, you will have the opportunity to work with a fast-growing startup that has a mature product line and a global audience. There is potential for relocation abroad and competitive incentives. We offer a fun and casual work environment with flexible hours. As you progress, there is the possibility of an onsite position abroad and promotion to the role of CTO.

                    About GoComet                

Website 


        GoComet is the world's best freight quote comparison platform used by enterprises to make freight procurement efficient and fast. As a technology company, we are revolutionizing the $40 billion international logistics space by eliminating inconsistencies in the procurement process at various stages of procurement like RFQs, quote comparisons, human-dependent negotiations, and insufficient disclosure of terms. Our enterprise SaaS product that is currently used by large manufacturing conglomerates combines the power of data science with progressive machine intelligence to drive sharp reverse auctions bringing out the best possible end-to-end rates for shipments.

About the internship

    GoComet is hiring an SDE-1 to join our nimble team. You should love working in teams to build things people use. You must be passionate to take responsibility and always enthusiastic about learning new things.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Perform well-defined engineering tasks; don't get caught up in the unknown, work to figure it out, ask questions 
2. Pursue improving engineering skills actively, including but not limited to problem-solving, writing readable/testable/efficient code, mastering technology in our stack, and learning to anticipate scaling issues
3. Demonstrate the ability to learn from mistakes 
4. Seek to tie projects back to user value & impact for our customers 
5. Find a work-life balance 
6. Communicate well with all members of the team 
7. Alert the manager/team to any issues preventing their work from being accomplished and ask for help 

Skills & Requirements:

1. Understanding of MVC Design pattern and its application in web development.
2. Understanding of using Python/Ruby
3. Should have live projects available to demonstrate 
4. Excellent understanding of object-oriented programming 
5. Good at analyzing and solving problems 
6. Passionate to work in a start-up 


Benefits of the role include: 

1. Mentorship and guidance from backend engineers 
2. Exposure to industry best practices and emerging technologies
3. Opportunity to enhance technical and analytical skills

                    About Unihire                

        Unihire is a platform that connects companies with universities and colleges to hire students for full-time roles/internships

We help companies, college management, and students streamline the whole end-to-end hiring process on a single online platform. Some of the core benefits of the platform are; that students get access to better opportunities based on their individual capabilities. They don't have to depend on the limited outreach of their college to get a good start in their career.

Secondly, universities can focus on what they do best - provide world-class education. Companies directly reach out to the relevant campuses and we manage the whole application process end-to-end. No need for email attachments and excel sheets. Also, companies save a lot of time by directly broadcasting a job to the relevant colleges rather than repeating the same process for each new college. Getting applications back take days rather than weeks because of our deep integration.

About the job

    Key responsibilities:

1. Server-side Development: Building efficient and scalable server-side applications using Node.js, which is known for its event-driven and non-blocking I/O model. This involves handling HTTP requests, implementing business logic, and integrating with databases and other services.
2. API Development: Designing and developing RESTful APIs or GraphQL endpoints to expose functionality and data to client applications. This includes defining routes, handling request/response objects, and ensuring proper authentication and authorization mechanisms are in place.
3. Database Integration: Integrating Node.js applications with databases like MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL. This involves designing database schemas, writing queries, and implementing data access layers (ORM or raw queries) to perform CRUD operations and manage data efficiently.
4. Front-end Collaboration: Collaborating with front-end developers to ensure smooth integration between the server-side and client-side components. This may involve providing necessary APIs, discussing data formats, and working together to deliver end-to-end features and functionality.
5. Testing and Debugging: Writing unit tests and integration tests to ensure the reliability and correctness of the codebase. Debugging and fixing issues in production or development environments, using debugging tools and techniques to diagnose and resolve problems.
6. Performance Optimization: Identifying and addressing performance bottlenecks in Node.js applications. This includes optimizing database queries, implementing caching mechanisms, using appropriate data structures, and adopting best practices to enhance the overall performance and scalability of the application.
7. Security and Authentication: Implementing security measures to protect the application and its data. This involves handling user authentication and authorization, validating input data, preventing common security vulnerabilities (such as SQL injection and cross-site scripting), and ensuring secure communication with external services.
8. Deployment and DevOps: Participating in deployment and DevOps processes to ensure smooth deployment and operation of the application. This may involve setting up build pipelines, configuring continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) systems, and monitoring application performance and availability.

Express.js
JavaScript

MySQL
Node.js
REST API

About the job

    A MERN stack developer is a software developer who specializes in building web applications using the MERN stack. The MERN stack is a popular web development technology stack that includes MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

Key responsibilities:

1. Develop and maintain web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack.
2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
3. Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
4. Troubleshoot and debug issues in existing applications and provide solutions.
5.  Participate in code reviews to ensure the quality of codebase.
6. Work with designers and front-end developers to implement and integrate user interfaces.
7.  Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
8.  Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in web development.
9. Continuously improve development processes and methodologies.
10. Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders to deliver high-quality software products on time.

2. Strong proficiency in JavaScript and its modern frameworks/libraries (React.js, Node.js).

4. Knowledge of Express.js or other Node.js frameworks.
5.  Familiarity with front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
6. Understanding of RESTful API design and development.
7. Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
8. Solid understanding of web development principles and best practices.
9.  Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
10.  Strong communication and collaboration skills.
11.  Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
12.  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent experience).

Post-QA Tester

We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented QA Tester to join our dynamic team. As a QA Tester, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our web portal and mobile application. Your primary responsibility will be to perform rigorous testing and identify defects or issues to ensure that our portal and app meet the highest standards of excellence.

Key responsibilities:

Test Planning and Execution: Collaborate with product team to understand all ongoing developments in the portal and then work on to design test cases, and develop comprehensive test plans and strategies. Then post development for each project, as per your earlier designed test cases and plans, execute various types of tests, including functional, regression, integration, system, and performance tests, to identify defects, inconsistencies, and errors in software applications.

   Test Automation: Collaborate with the product team to develop and maintain test automation scripts and frameworks to regularly test critical functionalities of our portal.

   Process Improvement: Contribute to the continuous improvement of the QA process by identifying areas for improvement, suggesting innovative solutions, and implementing best practices.

Requirements:

   Education: B.Tech, BCA/MCA, MSc.IT or a related field, (or equivalent work experience).

   Experience: At least 1 year of proven experience as a QA Tester or similar role for web applications, with a strong understanding of software testing principles, methodologies, and tools.

   Technical Skills: A good knowledge of at least one programming language (Java/PHP/Python etc). Familiar with full-stack development cycles.

   Tools: Experience with test automation tools and frameworks, such as Selenium, Appium, or similar, and the ability to develop and maintain test automation scripts.

About the job

    A subject matter expert (SME) is uniquely qualified to provide specialized knowledge to their team. Individuals designated as subject matter experts are typically sought out by others interested in leveraging their unique expertise to solve specific problems or help meet challenges. Being an expert is not a one-day job. Experts immerse in the topic and develop expertise over a long period.

The curriculum team at Allsoft Solutions is looking for a subject matter expert with a background in coding. This role involves assisting teachers and students with their queries, doubts and upskilling teachers on coding languages and various coding platforms/environments.

Key responsibilities:

1. Creating in house certification course(s) on different coding concepts
2. Creating and reviewing mock tests in line with the course created
3. Organizing and delivering training for teachers/ coordinating teams, also managing extra activities for Teacher Learning/Success/ Engagement to upscale them around technical aspects
4. Using the LMS environment to track the completion and adherence of all types of eLearning courses

Skill Sets:

Technical:

1. Understanding of Object-Oriented concepts
2. Basic understanding of core programming concepts with teaching skills will be an asset
3. Good exposure on Object-Oriented Programming language(s) (preferably JavaScript/Python)
4. Web Technology (HTML/CSS/JavaScript)- Front End Development
5. Block-Based Coding environment like Code.org or Scratch will be a plus
6. Knowledge of RDBMS (MySQL, Airtable, Firebase, etc.) will be an added advantage

Leadership Skills :

1. Asking the right questions to make things clear and simple
2. Good Problem-Solving Skills
3. Excelling in tasks assigned
4. Setting goals and working hard to achieve them
5. Improving abilities
6. Building relationships with coordinating team members
7. Having the right attitude
8. Good at responding to changes
9. Good Listening and Articulating skills
10. Should be open to suggestions and Feedback
11. Key Team player with critical thinking skills
12. Creative, Responsible, Honest, Motivated and Committed

Your role will include working on newsletter software from our database, conducting mass mailings via Brevo and MailChimp, and releasing Spotify podcasts using an RSS Editor.

About the job

    We are looking for a detail-oriented Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer to join our team. The QA Engineer is responsible for testing and evaluating software applications and systems to ensure they are free of bugs, and defects, and meet the end user's needs. This role offers the opportunity to collaborate with a dedicated team of professionals in a highly innovative environment. You will be able to significantly contribute to delivering our software products to our clients and ensure that they are of the highest quality. The ideal candidate is an excellent problem solver with a keen eye for detail.

Key responsibilities: 

1. Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to ensure a full understanding of individual deliverables
2. Develop detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases
3. Estimate, prioritize, plan, and coordinate testing activities
4. Identity, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs
5. Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved
6. Liaise with internal teams (e.g., developers and product managers) to identify system requirements
7. Monitor debugging process results
8. Investigate the causes of non-conforming software and train users to implement solutions
9. Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies

Requirements:

1. Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, engineering, or a related field
2. Proven work experience in software quality assurance
3. Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes
4. Experience writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and cases
5. Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing
6. Hands-on experience with automated testing tools is a plus.
7. Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.

Job Type: Full-time, Permanent
Skill(s) required

Java
Quality Assurance/Quality Control (QA/QC)
